reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://acc-test.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
SETUP
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Character Profile' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Enter '2c1cfceabb124dd' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Enter '8cbc1ffae4614cb' into the 'Biography' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Click the Cover Photo 'Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Character Profile dialog'.
Assert that img source of the Cover Photo contains 'HanSolo'.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Character Profile 2c1cfceabb124dd has been created.' is present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '3a28f7626c52432' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter 'e464214f3e7b4f7' into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 3a28f7626c52432 has been created.' is present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter 'd99283f19d1f4d2' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter 'b71c70a997114be' into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post d99283f19d1f4d2 has been created.' is present.
STEP 2
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Dynamic Queue' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Dynamic Queue' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'Dynamic Queue' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Click the 'Home' menu link.
STEP 3
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Dynamic Queue types' menu link.
Click the 'Add dynamic queue type' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add dynamic queue type dialog'.
STEP 4
Enter '25' in the 'Name' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
STEP 5
Click the 'MachineNameEdit_Lnk' button.
Enter '19c942f87090490' in the 'Name' text box.
Enter '19c942f87090490' in the 'MachineName' text box.
Select '1 min' from the 'Cache lifetime' drop down list.
Select 'Content' or 'Node' from the 'Entity type' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queue types dialog'.
Verify the text '19c942f87090490' is present on the page.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 6&7
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Dynamic Queues' menu link.
Click the 'Add 19c942f87090490' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add 19c942f87090490 dynamic queue dialog'.
Enter '5608de353cf5440' in the 'Title' text box.
Click the 'Newest' radio button under 'Sort by'.
Select 'Publish' from the 'TV Shows' drop down list.
Click the 'Save Dynamic Queue' button.
STEP 8
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Click the 'Dynamic Queues' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Dynamic Queues dialog'.
STEP 9 - MOVED TO SETUP
STEP 10
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Open a new browser window.
Switch to new browser tab/window.
Open url 'http://acc-test.publisher7.com/dynamic-queue/56'.

STEP 15

Verify the text 'Revision comparison' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Tokens' is present on the page.
STEP 18
